channel.title: Naples on EICP-LAB
channel.description: Recent content in Naples on EICP-LAB

item.title: The 3rd CSBF Conference
item.description: PhD candidate Zhenhuan Yang was invited to present his research titled “Raining on Bond: The Impact of Extreme Rain on Local Financing Costs” at the 3rd Conference on Sustainable Banking & Finance(CSBF), held at the University of Naples “Parthenope” in Naples (Napoli), Italy, from July 1 to 2.
